name: lspsnel3
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c4, csn(c5)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c4, csn(c5))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c4, csn(c5)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c4, csn(c5))))

stmt.origin: syl3anc(w0, wss(cfv(c4, csn(c5)), c1), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c5, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl3anc(w0, (c4 ` { c5 })⊆ c1, c3 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c5 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c4, csn(c5)), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c1))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c5, c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c5)), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c4, csn(c5))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c1))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c5, c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c5)), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c5, c1)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c5)), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clspn, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c3 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c5 ∈ c1)→(c4 ` { c5 })⊆ c1)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(LSpan ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c4, csn(c5))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clspn, c3))

comment: A member of the span of the singleton of a vector is a member of a subspace containing the vector. ( ~ elspansn3 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2014.)
